thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Tribeca - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value and location
thread.title_full: Good value and location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Tribeca, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CohenD1234
title: Good value and location
text: This hotel met our needs although the room was small for three of us. I picked it for location and budget and it was good for both reasons. The staff were friendly and accommodating while we and they struggled to deal with Winter Storm Stella. The subway stop a few steps away makes it very convenient and its location on 6th Avenue makes getting a cab from there a breeze. It was a good choice for us.
